name: Disappearance - Takeshi. You were right. That Abandoned Village is Too Bad
name_original: Disappearance - Takeshi. You were right. That Abandoned Village is Too Bad
description:
Game Live Streaming is welcome!
No advance notice is required for distribution.

If you would like to support us, please include the game title and Steam store URL in the summary section of your video.
It will be a great encouragement for our activities!
